original_title: Dialog delivers exclusive benefits with all new power plans
original_body_lines: Delivering a world of exclusive benefits, Dialog Axiata PLC, Sri Lanka’s premier connectivity provider, announced the launch of its upgraded range of Power Plans for Postpaid customers, aimed at providing the best possible experience and value for its customers.

The all new Power Plans presents an unparalleled postpaid experience with unmatched features including rolling-over unused data to the following month, sharing up to 50GB data with loved ones, accessing Unlimited YouTube for as low as Rs. 120 per month, Unlimited Dialog to Dialog calls and upgrading to Unlimited calls to any network for just Rs. 100 per month along with exclusive discounts on devices.

Complete with a selection of four distinct plans, all four plans include Unlimited D2D calls and 1000 SMS as standard, and also provide customers with the flexibility to select a suitable Power Plan based on their specific data needs. The plans start from as low as Rs. 600 per month with 5GB Data, along with a Rs. 800 plan with 10GB Data, a Rs. 1200 plan with 20GB Data, and a Rs. 2000 plan with 50GB Data. Customers can conveniently obtain a new connection via dialog.lk or upgrade via the MyDialog App.

In addition, Power Plan offers its subscribers premium benefits such as a distinguished “7 Star” loyalty status, providing exclusive discounts on smartphones, new Dialog connections (including Dialog Television & Home Broadband), and dongles/wingles. Further, subscribers can access unique offers and discounts from Dialog’s partner merchants.
